sourcesContent:
Welcome to My Portfolio

Frontend Developer

About Me

Hi, I'm Suvojit Modak, a passionate Frontend Developer creating beautiful and functional web experiences. I specialize in transforming complex problems into intuitive, visually appealing solutions. With expertise in modern web technologies, I build high-quality, responsive, and user-friendly applications. My goal is to continuously learn, grow, and contribute to innovative projects that make an impact.

Work Experience

Junior Frontend Developer

The Tech Clouds • 2023 - Present

Assisted in developing responsive web applications, collaborated with senior developers on UI components, and contributed to improving the user experience using modern frontend technologies.
